Grand Hyatt Melbourne & Pokies Club

One of the best hotels in Australia, which guarantees guests an unforgettable vacation with the very first and hottest impressions.

Rooms

About us

Grand Hyatt Melbourne is a luxury property located in the heart of Melbourne. Our hotel prides itself on its first-class reputation and impeccable service. We offer comfortable rooms and suites with rich interiors and modern amenities.

Rooms

Grand Hyatt Melbourne offers a wide range of different room categories to suit every guest's needs. Our room is a place where you can relax and enjoy fine wine. The rooms are decorated with art and incorporate the latest and most modern technologies to ensure maximum comfort and convenience for guests.

  • Grand Suite King
    • 80 sq m
    • City View

    Boasting two luxurious rooms and 180-degree views of the city, this 80-square-metre suite features one king bed, a lavish marble bathroom and exclusive access to Grand Club Lounge. This is a standard suite. See World of Hyatt program terms for upgrade eligibility.

  • Ambassador Suite
    • 100 sq m
    • City View

    Soak up the breathtaking vista of Melbourne in this 100-square-metre one king bedroom suite, with a marble master bathroom and exclusive access to Grand Club Lounge. This is a premium suite. See World of Hyatt program terms for upgrade eligibility.

  • Diplomatic Suite
    • 141 sq m
    • City View

    Overlooking Yarra River and the Melbourne skyline, this 141-square-metre king bedroom suite features separate living and work areas, a stunning Italian marble bathroom with sunken spa tub and exclusive access to Grand Club Lounge. This is a specialty suite.

  • Premier Suite
    • 182 sq m
    • City View

    Experience Melbourne’s finest luxury living with floor-to-ceiling city views from the oversize king bed in this 182-square-metre suite featuring an expansive marble bathroom and exclusive access to Grand Club Lounge. This is a specialty

Restaurants

Grand Hyatt Melbourne is known for its varied and delicious dining experience. Our restaurant offers dishes from a variety of world cuisines, prepared from fresh and high-quality ingredients. You can enjoy our gastronomic creations, which are guaranteed to satisfy even the most sophisticated tastes. We also offer a wide selection of cocktails and drinks so our guests can enjoy the hottest new releases in the world of mixology.

Grand Hyatt Melbourne is where you will find new and fresh ideas about luxury and comfort. We always strive to provide our guests with the very first and hottest services to make every stay at our hotel an unforgettable experience.

Pokies Club

The Grand Hyatt Melbourne in Australia features some of the best gaming experiences in the world. Our hot slots provide guests with a unique and exciting gaming experience, creating a real casino atmosphere right in the hotel.

Our games offer an amazing range of games, including the most popular and exciting new titles, to suit the tastes of every guest. With incredible jackpots and exciting bonus rounds, our games are sure to surprise and delight any gambler.

We also ensure safe and fair gaming for our visitors by following the highest security standards. Gaming at Grand Hyatt Melbourne provides the perfect setting for guests to enjoy the excitement of gambling in a luxurious and safe environment.
